    • Method Detail

      • login

        public User login​(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String password)
           throws LoginFailedException
        login with the provided credentials
        Parameters:
        name - username of the user
        password - password of the user
        Returns:
        a User object with the internal ID and username
        Throws:
        LoginFailedException - thrown if credentials are invalid

      • register

        public boolean register​(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String password)
                 throws RegisterFailedException
        Register a new User
        Parameters:
        name - the username for the new user
        password - the password for the new user
        Returns:
        true if the first result is a ResultSet object; false if the first result is an update count or there is no result
        Throws:
        RegisterFailedException - thrown, if the username is already taken, name or password too long

      • addToWatchList

        public void addToWatchList​(int userId,
                           Movie movie)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds a movie to the watchlist of a user. If the movie does not already exists in the database, it will be added. If the director (person) does not already exists in the database, it will be added.
        Parameters:
        userId - identifier of the current user
        movie - the movie which is added to the watchlist of the user
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown if the movie could not be added to the watchlist

      • removeFromWatchlist

        public boolean removeFromWatchlist​(int userId,
                                   Movie movie)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        removes a movie from the personal watchlist of the user
        Parameters:
        userId - identifier for the current user
        movie - the movie which is removed from the watchlist of the user
        Returns:
        true if the first result is a ResultSet object; false if the first result is an update count or there is no result
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown if the movie could not be removed from the watchlist, or the movie does not exist

      • setWatched

        public boolean setWatched​(int userId,
                          Movie movie,
                          boolean watched)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        mark a movie in the personal watchlist as watched (or not watched)
        Parameters:
        userId - identifier for the current user
        movie - the movie which is selected
        watched - boolean value if the movie is watched or not
        Returns:
        true if the first result is a ResultSet object; false if the first result is an update count or there is no result
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown if the value could not be set, or the movie does not exist

      • setRating

        public boolean setRating​(int userId,
                         Movie movie,
                         int rating)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        set the personal rating of a movie in the personal watchlist
        Parameters:
        userId - identifier for the current user
        movie - the movie which is selected
        rating - rating (between 0 - 100)
        Returns:
        true if the first result is a ResultSet object; false if the first result is an update count or there is no result
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown if the value could not be set, or the movie does not exist
